mapper.select: SELECT id, name, register_num, ceo_name, phone, address, register_date FROM client WHERE type = '구매' AND enabled = 'Y' ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client(id, type, name, ceo_name, register_num, email, address, detail_address, phone, zip_code, enabled) VALUES (client_seq.nextval, #{type}, #{name}, #{ceo_name}, #{register_num}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{phone}, #{zip_code}, #{enabled})
INSERT INTO item(id, name, category, price) VALUES (item_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{category}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, register_num, ceo_name, phone, address, detail_address, register_date, email, zip_code FROM client WHERE id = #{id} AND type = '구매' ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT i.id id, i.name name, i.category category, i.register_date register_date, i.price price FROM client c, client_product_list cpl, item i WHERE c.id = cpl.client_id AND cpl.item_id = i.id AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.id DESC
